system.description:
As natureâ€™s avengers, Ashbound @UUID[Compendium.savage-eberron.eberron-edges.Item.8ppOSrh2g3v2pYNa]{druids} consider arcane magic to be unnatural and destructive. They use their divine nature magic to call upon the very creatures they defend, empowering them to fight alongside them.

When an Ashbound druid activates @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.GLIypDUlcU2UCCje]{summon animal}, the power is automatically extended once without having to pay an additional Power Point at the end of its duration, and the creature gains a +1 bonus to all Fighting rolls.
